mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ord_delivery_info_details WHERE order_no = #{orderNumber} ORDER BY create_time DESC
SELECT * FROM ord_delivery_info_details WHERE order_no = #{orderNumber} AND operator_no = #{operatorNumber} ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ord_delivery_info_details (order_no, logistic_status, create_time, description, operation_type, operator_no, warehouse_no, task_no, picture) SELECT #{orderNo}, #{logisticStatus}, #{createTime}, #{description}, #{operationType}, #{operatorNo}, #{warehouseNo}, #{taskNo}, #{picture} FROM DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS( SELECT 'X' FROM ord_delivery_info_details WHERE order_no = #{orderNo} AND logistic_status = #{logisticStatus} );
mapper.update:
UPDATE ord_delivery_info_details
order_no = #{orderNo},
warehouse_no = #{warehouseNo},
operator_no = #{operatorNo},
operation_type = #{operationType},
is_read = #{isRead}
WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT e.`name` deliveryName, e.mobile deliveryPhone, odi.order_no orderNumber, oli.warehouse warehouseName FROM ord_delivery_info_details AS odi INNER JOIN emp_employee AS e ON e.delivery_clerk_no = odi.operator_no INNER JOIN ord_logistics_info AS oli ON oli.ord_no = odi.order_no WHERE odi.order_no = #{orderNumber} AND odi.operator_no = #{operatorNo} LIMIT 1

SELECT obi.sales_consult_name sellerName, obi.sales_consult_phone sellerPhone, obi.ord_no orderNumber, oli.shipping_address shippingAddress, oli.delivery_time deliveryTime, oli.receiver receiver, oli.receiver_phone receiverPhone, odid.task_no shipperNumber, obd.collection_amount collectionAmount FROM ord_base_info AS obi INNER JOIN ord_delivery_info_details AS odid ON obi.ord_no = odid.order_no AND obi.delivery_status = odid.logistic_status INNER JOIN ord_logistics_info AS oli ON obi.ord_no = oli.ord_no INNER JOIN ord_billing_details AS obd ON obi.ord_no = obd.ord_no WHERE obi.delivery_status = 'SEALED_CAR' AND odid.operator_no = #{operatorNo}

SELECT obi.sales_consult_name sellerName, obi.sales_consult_phone sellerPhone, obi.ord_no orderNumber, oli.shipping_address shippingAddress, oli.delivery_time deliveryTime, oli.receiver receiver, oli.receiver_phone receiverPhone, odid.task_no shipperNumber, obd.collection_amount collectionAmount FROM ord_base_info AS obi INNER JOIN ord_delivery_info_details AS odid ON obi.ord_no = odid.order_no INNER JOIN ord_logistics_info AS oli ON obi.ord_no = oli.ord_no INNER JOIN ord_billing_details AS obd ON obi.ord_no = obd.ord_no WHERE obi.ord_no = #{orderNumber} AND odid.logistic_status = 'SEALED_CAR' AND odid.operator_no = #{operatorNo}

select.if: SELECT odid.* FROM ord_base_info AS obi INNER JOIN ord_delivery_info_details AS odid ON odid.order_no = obi.ord_no WHERE obi.customer_id = #{userID} AND obi.create_time >= #{createTime} AND (odid.logistic_status = 'SEALED_CAR' OR odid.logistic_status = 'CONFIRM_ARRIVAL') ORDER BY obi.create_time

SELECT odid.* FROM ord_base_info AS obi INNER JOIN ord_delivery_info_details AS odid ON odid.order_no = obi.ord_no WHERE obi.creator_id = #{userID} AND obi.create_time >= #{createTime} AND (odid.logistic_status = 'SEALED_CAR' OR odid.logistic_status = 'CONFIRM_ARRIVAL') ORDER BY obi.create_time

mapper.select: SELECT orli.return_no returnNumber, orli.rejecter receiver, orli.rejecter_phone receiverPhone, obi.sales_consult_name sellerName, obi.sales_consult_phone sellerPhone, orli.return_full_address pickUpAddress, orli.delivery_time pickUpTime FROM ord_return_logistic_info AS orli INNER JOIN ord_return_base_info AS orbi ON orli.return_no = orbi.return_no INNER JOIN ord_base_info AS obi ON obi.ord_no = orbi.ord_no INNER JOIN ord_return_delivery_detail AS ordd ON ordd.return_no = orli.return_no WHERE ordd.return_logistic_status = 'PICKING_GOODS' AND orli.delivery_clerk_no = #{operatorNo}

SELECT orli.return_no returnNumber, orli.rejecter receiver, orli.rejecter_phone receiverPhone, obi.sales_consult_name sellerName, obi.sales_consult_phone sellerPhone, orli.return_full_address pickUpAddress, orli.delivery_time pickUpTime FROM ord_return_logistic_info AS orli INNER JOIN ord_return_base_info AS orbi ON orli.return_no = orbi.return_no INNER JOIN ord_base_info AS obi ON obi.ord_no = orbi.ord_no INNER JOIN ord_return_delivery_detail AS ordd ON ordd.return_no = orli.return_no WHERE ordd.return_logistic_status = 'PICKING_GOODS' AND orli.delivery_clerk_no = #{operatorNo} AND orbi.return_no = #{returnNumber}

SELECT orgi.retail_price, orgi.return_qty, gg.sku_name, gg.gid goodsId, gg.goods_specification, gg.cover_image_uri, gg.goods_unit FROM ord_return_goods_info AS orgi INNER JOIN gds_goods AS gg ON orgi.sku = gg.sku WHERE orgi.return_no = #{returnNumber}
SELECT * FROM ord_delivery_info_details WHERE order_no = #{orderNumber} AND logistic_status = #{logisticStatus}

SELECT obi.sales_consult_name sellerName, obi.sales_consult_phone sellerPhone, obi.ord_no orderNumber, oli.shipping_address shippingAddress, oli.delivery_time deliveryTime, oli.receiver receiver, oli.receiver_phone receiverPhone, odid.task_no shipperNumber, obd.collection_amount collectionAmount, oaa.`status` auditStatus FROM ord_base_info AS obi INNER JOIN ord_delivery_info_details AS odid ON obi.ord_no = odid.order_no AND obi.delivery_status = odid.logistic_status INNER JOIN ord_logistics_info AS oli ON obi.ord_no = oli.ord_no INNER JOIN ord_billing_details AS obd ON obi.ord_no = obd.ord_no INNER JOIN ord_arrears_audit AS oaa ON oaa.ord_no = obi.ord_no WHERE (oaa.`status` = 'AUDIT_NO' OR oaa.`status` = 'AUDIT_PASSED') AND oaa.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ord_base_info AS obi INNER JOIN ord_delivery_info_details AS odid ON obi.ord_no = odid.order_no AND obi.delivery_status = odid.logistic_status INNER JOIN ord_logistics_info AS oli ON obi.ord_no = oli.ord_no INNER JOIN ord_billing_details AS obd ON obi.ord_no = obd.ord_no INNER JOIN ord_arrears_audit AS oaa ON oaa.ord_no = obi.ord_no WHERE (oaa.`status` = 'AUDIT_NO' OR oaa.`status` = 'AUDIT_PASSED') AND oaa.user_id = #{userId}
